name: Social Deception
description: Manipulating social interactions and exploiting psychological weaknesses for identity concealment.

cards.title: Verbal Pretexting & Conversational Manipulation
cards.description: Using deception to extract information and maintain cover identities.
bulletpoints: Develop pretexting scripts for various scenarios
Redirect suspicion through controlled conversational pivots
Employ linguistic cues to reinforce assumed backgrounds
cards.summaryText: Script flexible pretexts, steer dialogue away from risk, and lace speech with cues that sustain your cover story.

cards.title: Body Language Control & Psychological Projection
cards.description: Mastering nonverbal cues to enhance deception and believability.
bulletpoints: Adjust posture and gait to match identity roles
Control microexpressions to avoid unintended signals
Use mirroring techniques to build trust with targets
cards.summaryText: Modulate stance, microexpressions, and mirroring to project the persona convincingly and calm scrutiny.
